app.handlers package¶

Submodules¶

app.handlers.device_handlers module¶

async app.handlers.device_handlers.associate_user_to_device(request)[source]¶

Associate a user to a device.

Parameters:

request (web.Request) – The request object containing the user ID and device ID.

Returns:

A JSON response indicating success or failure.

Return type:

web.Response

Returns:

async app.handlers.device_handlers.get_all_sensor_data_for_device(request)[source]¶

Get all sensor data for a device.

Parameters:

request (web.Request) – The request object containing the device ID.

Returns:

A JSON response with the sensor data for the specified device.

Return type:

web.Response

async app.handlers.device_handlers.get_all_sensor_data_for_user_device(request)[source]¶

Get all sensor data for a specific device belonging to a user.

Parameters:

request (web.Request) – The request object containing the user ID and device ID.

Returns:

A JSON response with the sensor data for the specified device and user.

web.Response

app.handlers.sensor_handlers module¶

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.add_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Creates new sensor data in the database.

params:

request: The request object containing sensor data.

Returns:

A JSON response with the created sensor data or an error message.

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.clear_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Deletes all sensor data from the database.

params:

request: The request object.

Returns:

A response indicating the success of the operation.

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.get_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Retrieves all sensor data from the database.

params:

request: The request object.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a list of sensor data.

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.list_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Retrieves a list of all sensor data from the database.

params:

request: The request object.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a list of sensor data.

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.remove_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Deletes specific sensor data from the database by its ID.

params:

request: The request object containing sensor data.

Returns:

A JSON response with the updated sensor data details or a 404 error if the sensor data is not found.

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.show_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Retrieves specific sensor data from the database by its ID.

params:

request: The request object containing the sensor data ID.

Returns:

A JSON response with the sensor data details or a 404 error if the sensor data is not found.

async app.handlers.sensor_handlers.update_sensor_data(request)[source]¶

Updates specific sensor data in the database by its ID.

params:

request: The request object containing sensor data.

Returns:

A JSON response with the updated sensor data details or a 404 error if the sensor data is not found.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.add_user(request)[source]¶

Add a new user to the database.

params:

request: The request object containing user data.

Returns:

A JSON response indicating success or failure of user creation.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.clear_users(request)[source]¶

Delete all users from the database.

params:

request: The request object.

Returns:

A response indicating the success of the operation.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.list_users(request)[source]¶

Retrieve a list of all users.

params:

request: The request object.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a list of users.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.register_user(request)[source]¶

Handle user registration.

params:

request: The request object containing user data.

Returns:

A JSON response indicating success or failure of user registration.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.remove_user(request)[source]¶

Delete a user from the database by their ID.

params:

request: The request object containing the user ID.

Returns:

A response indicating the success of the operation or an error message.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.show_user(request)[source]¶

Retrieve a user’s details from the database by their ID.

params:

request: The request object containing the user ID.

Returns:

A JSON response with the user’s details or a 404 error if the user is not found.

async app.handlers.user_handlers.update_user(request)[source]¶

Update a user’s details in the database.

params:

request: The request object containing user data.

Returns:

A JSON response with the updated user details or an error message.
